des: Rich quality Christian internet radio featuring popular and independent Christian/Gospel artists. Also featuring weekly messages and encouragement from Pastor Robert Morris, Dr. Tony Evans, Unshackled, Creation Moments, as well as Joni and Friends. Weekly prophecy from Pastor Trudy Daley!
